snippet: “Louis C. Tiffany and the Art of Devotion” brings together mosaics, stained-glass windows and other liturgical objects at the Museum of Biblical Art in Manhattan.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; Museum of Biblical Art's exhibit Louis C Tiffany and the Art of Devotion brings together mosaics, stained-glass windows and other liturgical objects; three major collections of vintage ship models and dioramas are being sold.
lead_paragraph: “Louis C. Tiffany and the Art of Devotion” brings together mosaics, stained-glass windows and other liturgical objects at the Museum of Biblical Art in Manhattan.

headline.seo: ‘Louis C. Tiffany and the Art of Devotion’ at Biblical Art
headline.main: A Celestial Show From a Tiffany Window
headline.print_headline:
A Celestial Show
From a Tiffany Window
